2) If the seat ultimately remains available, the limiting factor is not additional information or a commitment statement from you; it is our priority order and the uncertainty about whether higher-priority candidates will enter/return to us. Your willingness to commit is noted and appreciated.

If you would like to remain under consideration, you may check back in later rounds; if it becomes clear that no higher-priority candidate will take the seat, we will reassess at that time.

School_A Admissions
